tooltips.stretchRest: Restores 1D6 HP (2D6 with Healing), 1D6 WP, and removes 1 condition
tooltips.shiftRest: Restores all HP, all WP, and removes all conditions
tooltips.passOneShift: Advances time without resting, making rest actions available again

weapons.weaponBroken: {weapon} is broken and cannot be used!

traits.onlyForNpcsMonsters: Traits are only available for NPCs and Monsters

lightTest.notForMonsters: Light tests are not available for monsters

fearTest.notForMonsters: Fear tests are not available for monsters

fearEffect.instruction: If the WIL roll fails, you must roll on the fear table:
fearEffect.noPermission: You do not have permission to roll for this character
fearEffect.tableFailed: Failed to roll fear effect table

severeInjury.tableNotFound: Severe Injury roll table not found
severeInjury.tableFailed: Failed to roll severe injury table
severeInjury.failed: Failed to perform severe injury test
severeInjury.onlyForCharacters: Severe injury tests are only available for characters
severeInjury.noPermission: You don't have permission to roll for this character

deathRoll.methodNotAvailable: Could not perform death roll - sheet method not available

monster.attacksOnlyForMonsters: Monster attacks can only be used by monsters
monster.defendOnlyForMonsters: Monster defend can only be used by monsters
monster.weaponDamageOnlyForMonsters: Monster weapon damage can only be used by monsters

lightTest.title: Light Test
lightTest.note: Note: All light sources burn for up to one shift of time. Roll of 1 always extinguishes the light.

table.afterStretchOrWeapon: After stretch or used as weapon

showAttributes.name: Show Attributes
showAttributes.hint: Display attribute roll actions on the HUD

showInjuries.name: Show Injuries
showInjuries.hint: Display injuries and conditions on the HUD

showEquippedWeaponsOnly.name: Show Equipped Weapons Only
showEquippedWeaponsOnly.hint: Only show equipped/held weapons on the HUD

showDeathRoll.name: Show Death Roll
showDeathRoll.hint: Automatically show death roll action when character is dying

showAllSpells.name: Show All Spells
showAllSpells.hint: Show all known spells instead of only prepared spells. Prepared spells will be marked with ⚡

showWeaponSkills.name: Show Weapon Skills
showWeaponSkills.hint: Display weapon skills on the HUD

showSecondarySkills.name: Show Secondary Skills
showSecondarySkills.hint: Display secondary skills on the HUD

showUnequippedItems.name: Show Unequipped Items
showUnequippedItems.hint: Show unequipped armor, helmets, and items on the HUD

severeInjuryTableUuid.name: Severe Injury Table UUID
severeInjuryTableUuid.hint: UUID of the Severe Injury roll table (e.g., RollTable.4wZ2sIWqV3tw8eKL). Leave blank to auto-detect by table name (English or Swedish).

fearEffectTableUuid.name: Fear Effect Table UUID
fearEffectTableUuid.hint: UUID of the Fear effect roll table (e.g., RollTable.wHTr9HuHkpVv7ccX). Leave blank to auto-detect by table name (English or Swedish).
